name: Baldi's Basics New Opening School (1.4.3 Port)
name_original: Baldi's Basics New Opening School (1.4.3 Port)
description:
Baldi's Basics New Opening School (1.4.3 Port) is a game developed by BA10-Reupload. It was originally released in 2020.
You can play Baldi's Basics New Opening School (1.4.3 Port) on PC, macOS and Linux. The game is sold via itch.io.
